In International Conference on Pattern Recognition - Parallel Computing, pages 275-278, Tel Aviv, Israel, 1994. Invited paper.<P> C. Guerra. Geometric approaches to protein comparison. In Proceedings Scuola di Bioinformatica, Camerino, Italy, 1994.<P> C. Guerra, G. Bongiovanni, and P. Crescenzi. Parallel Simulated Annealing for Shape Detection. Computer Vision Graphics and Image Processing: Image Understanding, 61(1):60-69, 1995.<P> C. Guerra and V. Cantoni. Generating Tree Models of 2D Objects. In Proceedings of the Second Asian Conference on Computer Vision, pages 47-51, Singapore, 1995.<P> C. Guerra, V. Cantoni, L. Cinque, S. Levialdi, and L. Lombardi. Recognizing Objects by a Multiresolution Approach. In International Conference on Pattern Recognition - Parallel Computing, pages 310-316, Tel Aviv, Israel, 1994.<P> C. Guerra, L. Cinque, and S. Levialdi. Reply to: Performance Characterization in Computer Vision, by R. M. Haralick. Computer Vision Graphics and Image Processing: Image Understanding, 60(2), September 1994. Invited paper.<P> C. Guerra, E. N. Houstis, and A. Joshi. Reconstruction of Rectangles From Projections: An Application to Surface Mounted Device Placement.
